verses.verse: וַיְדַבֵּ֥ר <WH1696> spake יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> And the LORD אֶל־ <WH413> to מֹשֶׁ֥ה <WH4872> unto Moses לֵּאמֹֽר׃ <WH559> saying

נְקֹ֗ם <WH5358> Take נִקְמַת֙ <WH5360> full בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> of Israel מֵאֵ֖ת <WH853> הַמִּדְיָנִ֑ים <WH4084> of the Midianites אַחַ֖ר <WH310> afterward תֵּאָסֵ֥ף <WH622> shalt thou be gathered אֶל־ <WH413> to עַמֶּֽיךָ׃ <WH5971> unto thy people

וַיְדַבֵּ֤ר <WH1696> spake מֹשֶׁה֙ <WH4872> And Moses אֶל־ <WH413> to הָעָ֣ם <WH5971> unto the people לֵאמֹ֔ר <WH559> saying הֵחָלְצ֧וּ <WH2502> Arm מֵאִתְּכֶ֛ם <WH853> אֲנָשִׁ֖ים <WH376> men לַצָּבָ֑א <WH6635> of yourselves unto the war וְיִהְיוּ֙ <WH1961> may go עַל־ <WH5921> against מִדְיָ֔ן <WH4080> and let them go against the Midianites לָתֵ֥ת <WH5414> to execute נִקְמַת־ <WH5360> vengeance יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> the LORD בְּמִדְיָֽן׃ <WH4080> of Midian

אֶ֚לֶף <WH505> A thousand לַמַּטֶּ֔ה <WH4294> throughout all the tribes אֶ֖לֶף <WH505> A thousand לַמַּטֶּ֑ה <WH4294> the tribes לְכֹל֙ <WH3605> of all מַטּ֣וֹת <WH4294> the tribes יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> of Israel תִּשְׁלְח֖וּ <WH7971> shall ye send לַצָּבָֽא׃ <WH6635> to the war

וַיִּמָּֽסְרוּ֙ <WH4560> So there were delivered מֵאַלְפֵ֣י <WH505> out of the thousands יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> of Israel אֶ֖לֶף <WH505> a thousand לַמַּטֶּ֑ה <WH4294> of [every] tribe שְׁנֵים־ <WH8147> both עָשָׂ֥ר <WH6240> ten אֶ֖לֶף <WH505> thousand חֲלוּצֵ֥י <WH2502> armed צָבָֽא׃ <WH6635> for war

וַיִּשְׁלַ֨ח <WH7971> sent אֹתָ֥ם <WH853> מֹשֶׁ֛ה <WH4872> And Moses אֶ֥לֶף <WH505> a thousand לַמַּטֶּ֖ה <WH4294> of [every] tribe לַצָּבָ֑א <WH6635> them to the war אֹ֠תָם <WH853> וְאֶת־ <WH853> פִּ֨ינְחָ֜ס <WH6372> them and Phinehas בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son אֶלְעָזָ֤ר <WH499> of Eleazar הַכֹּהֵן֙ <WH3548> the priest לַצָּבָ֔א <WH6635> to the war וּכְלֵ֥י <WH3627> instruments הַקֹּ֛דֶשׁ <WH6944> with the holy וַחֲצֹצְר֥וֹת <WH2689> and the trumpets הַתְּרוּעָ֖ה <WH8643> to blow בְּיָדֽוֹ׃ <WH3027> in his hand

וַֽיִּצְבְּאוּ֙ <WH6633> And they warred עַל־ <WH5921> against מִדְיָ֔ן <WH4080> against the Midianites כַּאֲשֶׁ֛ר <WH834> after צִוָּ֥ה <WH6680> commanded יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> as the LORD אֶת־ <WH853> מֹשֶׁ֑ה <WH4872> Moses וַיַּֽהַרְג֖וּ <WH2026> and they slew כָּל־ <WH3605> every זָכָֽר׃ <WH2145> all the males

וְאֶת־ <WH853> מַלְכֵ֨י <WH4428> the kings מִדְיָ֜ן <WH4080> of Midian הָרְג֣וּ <WH2026> And they slew עַל־ <WH5921> beside חַלְלֵיהֶ֗ם <WH2491> the rest of them that were slain אֶת־ <WH853> אֱוִ֤י <WH189> [namely] Evi וְאֶת־ <WH853> רֶ֙קֶם֙ <WH7552> and Rekem וְאֶת־ <WH853> צ֤וּר <WH6698> and Zur וְאֶת־ <WH853> חוּר֙ <WH2354> and Hur וְאֶת־ <WH853> רֶ֔בַע <WH7254> and Reba חֲמֵ֖שֶׁת <WH2568> five מַלְכֵ֣י <WH4428> kings מִדְיָ֑ן <WH4080> of Midian וְאֵת֙ <WH853> בִּלְעָ֣ם <WH1109> Balaam בֶּן־ <WH1121> also the son בְּע֔וֹר <WH1160> of Beor הָרְג֖וּ <WH2026> they slew בֶּחָֽרֶב׃ <WH2719> with the sword

וַיִּשְׁבּ֧וּ <WH7617> captives בְנֵי־ <WH1121> And the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֛ל <WH3478> of Israel אֶת־ <WH853> נְשֵׁ֥י <WH802> took [all] the women מִדְיָ֖ן <WH4080> of Midian וְאֶת־ <WH853> טַפָּ֑ם <WH2945> and their little ones וְאֵ֨ת <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> and all בְּהֶמְתָּ֧ם <WH929> of all their cattle וְאֶת־ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> and all מִקְנֵהֶ֛ם <WH4735> and all their flocks וְאֶת־ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> and all חֵילָ֖ם <WH2428> and all their goods בָּזָֽזוּ׃ <WH962> and took the spoil

וְאֵ֤ת <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all עָרֵיהֶם֙ <WH5892> all their cities בְּמ֣וֹשְׁבֹתָ֔ם <WH4186> wherein they dwelt וְאֵ֖ת <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> and all טִֽירֹתָ֑ם <WH2918> and all their goodly castles שָׂרְפ֖וּ <WH8313> And they burnt בָּאֵֽשׁ׃ <WH784> with fire

וַיִּקְחוּ֙ <WH3947> And they took אֶת־ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all הַשָּׁלָ֔ל <WH7998> all the spoil וְאֵ֖ת <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> and all הַמַּלְק֑וֹחַ <WH4455> and all the prey בָּאָדָ֖ם <WH120> [both] of men וּבַבְּהֵמָֽה׃ <WH929> and of beasts

וַיָּבִ֡אוּ <WH935> And they brought אֶל־ <WH413> to מֹשֶׁה֩ <WH4872> unto Moses וְאֶל־ <WH413> and to אֶלְעָזָ֨ר <WH499> and Eleazar הַכֹּהֵ֜ן <WH3548> the priest וְאֶל־ <WH413> and to עֲדַ֣ת <WH5712> and unto the congregation בְּנֵֽי־ <WH1121> of the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֗ל <WH3478> of Israel אֶת־ <WH853> הַשְּׁבִ֧י <WH7628> the captives וְאֶת־ <WH853> הַמַּלְק֛וֹחַ <WH4455> and the prey וְאֶת־ <WH853> הַשָּׁלָ֖ל <WH7998> and the spoil אֶל־ <WH413> to הַֽמַּחֲנֶ֑ה <WH4264> unto the camp אֶל־ <WH413> at עַֽרְבֹ֣ת <WH6160> at the plains מוֹאָ֔ב <WH4124> of Moab אֲשֶׁ֖ר <WH834> which עַל־ <WH5921> are by יַרְדֵּ֥ן <WH3383> which [are] by Jordan יְרֵחֽוֹ׃ <WH3405> [near] Jericho ס

וַיֵּ֨צְא֜וּ <WH3318> went forth מֹשֶׁ֨ה <WH4872> And Moses וְאֶלְעָזָ֧ר <WH499> and Eleazar הַכֹּהֵ֛ן <WH3548> the priest וְכָל־ <WH3605> and all נְשִׂיאֵ֥י <WH5387> and all the princes הָעֵדָ֖ה <WH5712> of the congregation לִקְרָאתָ֑ם <WH7125> to meet אֶל־ <WH413> about מִח֖וּץ <WH2351> them without לַֽמַּחֲנֶֽה׃ <WH4264> the camp

וַיִּקְצֹ֣ף <WH7107> was wroth מֹשֶׁ֔ה <WH4872> And Moses עַ֖ל <WH5921> with פְּקוּדֵ֣י <WH6485> with the officers הֶחָ֑יִל <WH2428> of the host שָׂרֵ֤י <WH8269> [with] the captains הָאֲלָפִים֙ <WH505> over thousands וְשָׂרֵ֣י <WH8269> and captains הַמֵּא֔וֹת <WH3967> over hundreds הַבָּאִ֖ים <WH935> which came מִצְּבָ֥א <WH6635> from הַמִּלְחָמָֽה׃ <WH4421> the battle
וַיֹּ֥אמֶר <WH559> said אֲלֵיהֶ֖ם <WH413> and מֹשֶׁ֑ה <WH4872> And Moses הַֽחִיִּיתֶ֖ם <WH2421> unto them Have ye saved כָּל־ <WH3605> all נְקֵבָֽה׃ <WH5347> all the women

הֵ֣ן <WH2005> Behold הֵ֜נָּה <WH2007> Behold these הָי֨וּ <WH1961> caused לִבְנֵ֤י <WH1121> the children יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <WH3478> of Israel בִּדְבַ֣ר <WH1697> through the counsel בִּלְעָ֔ם <WH1109> of Balaam לִמְסָר־ <WH4560> to commit מַ֥עַל <WH4604> trespass בַּיהוָ֖ה <WH3068> against the LORD עַל־ <WH5921> in דְּבַר־ <WH1697> in the matter פְּע֑וֹר <WH6465> of Peor וַתְּהִ֥י <WH1961> caused הַמַּגֵּפָ֖ה <WH4046> and there was a plague בַּעֲדַ֥ת <WH5712> among the congregation יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> of the LORD

וְעַתָּ֕ה <WH6258> Now הִרְג֥וּ <WH2026> Now therefore kill כָל־ <WH3605> every זָכָ֖ר <WH2145> every male בַּטָּ֑ף <WH2945> among the little ones וְכָל־ <WH3605> every אִשָּׁ֗ה <WH802> every woman יֹדַ֥עַת <WH3045> that hath known אִ֛ישׁ <WH376> man לְמִשְׁכַּ֥ב <WH4904> by lying זָכָ֖ר <WH2145> with him הֲרֹֽגוּ׃ <WH2026> and kill

וְכֹל֙ <WH3605> all הַטַּ֣ף <WH2945> children בַּנָּשִׁ֔ים <WH802> But all the women אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> who לֹא־ <WH3808> have not יָדְע֖וּ <WH3045> that have not known מִשְׁכַּ֣ב <WH4904> by lying זָכָ֑ר <WH2145> a man הַחֲי֖וּ <WH2421> with him keep alive לָכֶֽם׃

וְאַתֶּ֗ם <WH859> and you חֲנ֛וּ <WH2583> And do ye abide מִח֥וּץ <WH2351> without לַֽמַּחֲנֶ֖ה <WH4264> the camp שִׁבְעַ֣ת <WH7651> seven יָמִ֑ים <WH3117> days כֹּל֩ <WH3605> whoever הֹרֵ֨ג <WH2026> whosoever hath killed נֶ֜פֶשׁ <WH5315> any person וְכֹ֣ל ׀ <WH3605> and whoever נֹגֵ֣עַ <WH5060> and whosoever hath touched בֶּֽחָלָ֗ל <WH2491> any slain תִּֽתְחַטְּא֞וּ <WH2398> purify בַּיּ֤וֹם <WH3117> day הַשְּׁלִישִׁי֙ <WH7992> on the third וּבַיּ֣וֹם <WH3117> day הַשְּׁבִיעִ֔י <WH7637> and on the seventh אַתֶּ֖ם <WH859> you וּשְׁבִיכֶֽם׃ <WH7628> [both] yourselves and your captives

וְכָל־ <WH3605> every בֶּ֧גֶד <WH899> all [your] raiment וְכָל־ <WH3605> and every כְּלִי־ <WH3627> and all that is made ע֛וֹר <WH5785> of skins וְכָל־ <WH3605> and all מַעֲשֵׂ֥ה <WH4639> and all work עִזִּ֖ים <WH5795> of goats' וְכָל־ <WH3605> and all כְּלִי־ <WH3627> [hair] and all things made עֵ֑ץ <WH6086> of wood תִּתְחַטָּֽאוּ׃ <WH2398> And purify ס

וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <WH559> said אֶלְעָזָ֤ר <WH499> And Eleazar הַכֹּהֵן֙ <WH3548> the priest אֶל־ <WH413> unto אַנְשֵׁ֣י <WH582> unto the men הַצָּבָ֔א <WH6635> of war הַבָּאִ֖ים <WH935> which went לַמִּלְחָמָ֑ה <WH4421> to the battle זֹ֚את <WH2063> likewise חֻקַּ֣ת <WH2708> This [is] the ordinance הַתּוֹרָ֔ה <WH8451> of the law אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> which צִוָּ֥ה <WH6680> commanded יְהוָ֖ה <WH3069> God אֶת־ <WH853> מֹשֶֽׁה׃ <WH4872> Moses

אַ֥ךְ <WH389> only אֶת־ <WH853> הַזָּהָ֖ב <WH2091> Only the gold וְאֶת־ <WH853> הַכָּ֑סֶף <WH3701> and the silver אֶֽת־ <WH853> הַנְּחֹ֙שֶׁת֙ <WH5178> the brass אֶת־ <WH853> הַבַּרְזֶ֔ל <WH1270> the iron אֶֽת־ <WH853> הַבְּדִ֖יל <WH913> the tin וְאֶת־ <WH853> הָעֹפָֽרֶת׃ <WH5777> and the lead

כָּל־ <WH3605> everything דָּבָ֞ר <WH1697> Every thing אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> that יָבֹ֣א <WH935> that may abide בָאֵ֗שׁ <WH784> the fire תַּעֲבִ֤ירוּ <WH5674> ye shall make [it] go through בָאֵשׁ֙ <WH784> the fire וְטָהֵ֔ר <WH2891> and it shall be clean אַ֕ךְ <WH389> also בְּמֵ֥י <WH4325> with the water נִדָּ֖ה <WH5079> of separation יִתְחַטָּ֑א <WH2398> nevertheless it shall be purified וְכֹ֨ל <WH3605> everything אֲשֶׁ֧ר <WH834> after לֹֽא־ <WH3808> cannot יָבֹ֛א <WH935> and all that abideth בָּאֵ֖שׁ <WH784> not the fire תַּעֲבִ֥ירוּ <WH5674> ye shall make go through בַמָּֽיִם׃ <WH4325> the water

וְכִבַּסְתֶּ֧ם <WH3526> And ye shall wash בִּגְדֵיכֶ֛ם <WH899> your clothes בַּיּ֥וֹם <WH3117> day הַשְּׁבִיעִ֖י <WH7637> on the seventh וּטְהַרְתֶּ֑ם <WH2891> and ye shall be clean וְאַחַ֖ר <WH310> and afterward תָּבֹ֥אוּ <WH935> ye shall come אֶל־ <WH413> about הַֽמַּחֲנֶֽה׃ <WH4264> into the camp פ
וַיֹּ֥אמֶר <WH559> spake יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> And the LORD אֶל־ <WH413> to מֹשֶׁ֥ה <WH4872> unto Moses לֵּאמֹֽר׃ <WH559> saying

שָׂ֗א <WH5375> Take אֵ֣ת <WH853> רֹ֤אשׁ <WH7218> the sum מַלְק֙וֹחַ֙ <WH4455> of the prey הַשְּׁבִ֔י <WH7628> that was taken בָּאָדָ֖ם <WH120> [both] of man וּבַבְּהֵמָ֑ה <WH929> and of beast אַתָּה֙ <WH859> You וְאֶלְעָזָ֣ר <WH499> thou and Eleazar הַכֹּהֵ֔ן <WH3548> the priest וְרָאשֵׁ֖י <WH7218> and the chief אֲב֥וֹת <WH1> fathers הָעֵדָֽה׃ <WH5712> of the congregation

וְחָצִ֙יתָ֙ <WH2673> into two parts אֶת־ <WH853> הַמַּלְק֔וֹחַ <WH4455> the prey בֵּ֚ין <WH996> between תֹּפְשֵׂ֣י <WH8610> between them that took הַמִּלְחָמָ֔ה <WH4421> the war הַיֹּצְאִ֖ים <WH3318> upon them who went out לַצָּבָ֑א <WH6635> to battle וּבֵ֖ין <WH996> between כָּל־ <WH3605> and all הָעֵדָֽה׃ <WH5712> and between all the congregation

וַהֲרֵמֹתָ֨ <WH7311> And levy מֶ֜כֶס <WH4371> a tribute לַֽיהוָ֗ה <WH3068> unto the LORD מֵאֵ֞ת <WH853> אַנְשֵׁ֤י <WH376> the men הַמִּלְחָמָה֙ <WH4421> of war הַיֹּצְאִ֣ים <WH3318> which went out לַצָּבָ֔א <WH6635> to battle אֶחָ֣ד <WH259> one נֶ֔פֶשׁ <WH5315> soul מֵחֲמֵ֖שׁ <WH2568> of five הַמֵּא֑וֹת <WH3967> hundred מִן־ <WH4480> at הָאָדָם֙ <WH120> [both] of the persons וּמִן־ <WH4480> and of הַבָּקָ֔ר <WH1241> and of the beeves וּמִן־ <WH4480> and of הַחֲמֹרִ֖ים <WH2543> and of the asses וּמִן־ <WH4480> and of הַצֹּֽאן׃ <WH6629> and of the sheep

מִמַּֽחֲצִיתָ֖ם <WH4276> [it] of their half תִּקָּ֑חוּ <WH3947> Take וְנָתַתָּ֛ה <WH5414> and give לְאֶלְעָזָ֥ר <WH499> it unto Eleazar הַכֹּהֵ֖ן <WH3548> the priest תְּרוּמַ֥ת <WH8641> [for] an heave offering יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> of the LORD

וּמִמַּחֲצִ֨ת <WH4276> half בְּנֵֽי־ <WH1121> And of the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֜ל <WH3478> of Israel's תִּקַּ֣ח ׀ <WH3947> thou shalt take אֶחָ֣ד ׀ <WH259> one אָחֻ֣ז <WH270> portion מִן־ <WH4480> of every הַחֲמִשִּׁ֗ים <WH2572> of fifty מִן־ <WH4480> at הָאָדָ֧ם <WH120> of the persons מִן־ <WH4480> at הַבָּקָ֛ר <WH1241> of the beeves מִן־ <WH4480> at הַחֲמֹרִ֥ים <WH2543> of the asses וּמִן־ <WH4480> and of הַצֹּ֖אן <WH6629> and of the flocks מִכָּל־ <WH3605> all הַבְּהֵמָ֑ה <WH929> of all manner of beasts וְנָתַתָּ֤ה <WH5414> and give אֹתָם֙ <WH853> לַלְוִיִּ֔ם <WH3881> them unto the Levites שֹׁמְרֵ֕י <WH8104> which keep מִשְׁמֶ֖רֶת <WH4931> the charge מִשְׁכַּ֥ן <WH4908> of the tabernacle יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> of the LORD
